post.text:
A message from Ivanka Trump:
 
"Contribute now and my father will double every dollar you give, up to $2 MILLION, before Wednesday, August 31, at 11:59pm.

https://secure.donaldjtrump.com/august-end-of-month?amount=250&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=t_djt0831200646_ivanka-video-aug-eom&utm_source=facebook&utm_content=ivanka-video-aug-eom_fb_organic
 
You put in $100, he'll make it $200.
You put in $250, he'll make it $500.
You put in $500, he'll make it $1,000.
 
He'll also send you a personal thank you gift."

comment.author: Sarah
comment.text: Ivanka Trump - trying to make another contribution and this link will not work. I have tried three times. Is it crashing from a large amount of donations. I hope that is the problem.

replies.author: Emily
replies.text: Text to 88022...u can contribute from there..

replies.author: Benjamin
replies.text: It is not working because it is a SCAM. Donate your money for education. One set the books and a bookbag for one child is more beneficial. Count! If each person who is braging of donating money to a Millionaire were giving tools to a child to grew up and make America a rich and educated country, we would be again to be free. Feed the poor, teach the young, Take care pf the elder, your parents, the sick. Be a good citizen of the world , become an example to America.

replies.author: Sarah
replies.text: Benjamin - are you giving to buy books and bookbags? I'm proud for you if you are. Putting your money where you mouth is, is important. If that is your passion then do it. We are not "bragging," we are supporting. I give to areas I have a passion to give. I also give to help support my choice of President.
